title: FTX Estate Stakes 5.5 Million SOL; Millions Locked Until 2028
description: Blockchain records have shed light on a development involving the trustees of the now-defunct exchange FTX, who are overseeing its bankruptcy proceedings. They have committed 5.5 million solana (SOL) for staking. Meanwhile, the current market value of FTX’s total solana assets is a hefty $1.16 billion. However, it’s worth highlighting that a significant portion of […]

title: Federal Government Initiates N5 Million Grant Scheme for AI Research and Innovation
description: The Nigerian Federal Government has recently launched an innovative initiative, the Nigeria Artificial Intelligence Research Scheme, designed to foster the advancement of artificial intelligence (AI) in the country. Spearheaded by the Minister of Communications, Innovation, and Digital Economy, Dr. Bosun Tijani, this pioneering scheme is set to award N5 million in grants to 45 startups ... Read more

title: Wall Street, take note: China’s new blueprint to rescue stocks
description: Wall Street better start paying close attention, because China’s drawing up new blueprints to save its plummeting stock market. As the numbers roll in, it’s evident that China’s mammoth economy is teetering. And for those who aren’t savvy with financial jargon: that’s not a good sign. title: Top 3 Assets to Beat High-Interest Rates in 2023: Insights from AI Investment Expert
description: In March 2022, the Federal Reserve (FED) embarked on a journey of interest rate hikes that has shown no signs of slowing down. title: California Governor Gavin Newsom signs bill regulating crypto
description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom has reportedly enacted two significant crypto-related legislative measures. The new laws aim to create a solid regulatory framework.

title: Ferrari to accept Bitcoin and Ether as payment for luxury cars
description: Maranello, Italy-based Ferrari plans to bring the new payment option to Europe in the first quarter of 2024. Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH) and USDC will be accepted.
